channel.title: New Painkiller game?
channel.description:
Hello, everyone. I've played Painkiller and I assume most of you here have played Painkiller before...
[url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UoA1oBEnzkY']https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UoA1oBEnzkY[/url]
So I'm wondering if People Can Fly will make ANOTHER Painkiller game. But this time on Unreal Engine 3.5 or 3. Just imagine.... no reloading, loads of heavy metal music, and killing LOTS of demons. The thought of it makes me ^_^

item.title: New Painkiller game?

item.description:
ITT someone trying to create a fanclub for a mediocre game despite numerous people telling him that nobody cares.

GordonFreeManz:

WHO THINKS SOMEONE SHOULD MAKE A FIRST-PERSON SHOOTER WORTHY OF THE TITLE?

It’s already in the works. It’s called Stalker 2.

item.title: New Painkiller game?
item.dc:creator: GordonFreeManz
item.description:
Hey everyone, (including CTID) I want to say… Regardless of our affiliations, religions, politics, race, or what not… We all have to admit. Video games aren’t video games anymore… They are ALL movie cliche games… I mean if you want a linear plot while having scripted events you might as well watch a Micheal Bay movie or Die Hard. I mean honestly, who here thinks we need more old-school style games? I mean, remember back in the day when games were about having fun, shooting demons, Nazis (no offense CTID), aliens, mutants, and robots? Now it’s just the same enemy over and over… boring old terrorists. Who else here…

WHO THINKS SOMEONE SHOULD LIBERATE THE GAMING INDUSTRY??

WHO THINKS SOMEONE SHOULD MAKE A FIRST-PERSON SHOOTER WORTHY OF THE TITLE?

FOR THE LEAGUE OF THE FPSNATIONS I PLEDGE THIS OATH TO HIGH LEADER AND FOUNDER GORDONFREEMANZ AND I WILL PLAY ALL OLD-SCHOOL FIRST-PERSON SHOOTERS! BY THIS OATH I WILL NOT BE A COD FANBOY OR A BATTLEFIELD FANBOY! I WILL ALWAYS PLAY DOOM! I WILL ALWAYS LOVE THE 90’S ID! AND LONG LIVE OLD-SCHOOL FIRST-PERSON SHOOTERS!

Queen- Bohemian Rhapsody is the National Anthem of the League of The FPSNations

Read full topic

item.title: New Painkiller game?
item.dc:creator: snob
item.description:
I know people who are still playing the multiplayer for PK, even after the age of CPL and WSVG. The game is fun in it’s own right, but If I had to pitch one thing to the developers would be to fix the netcode. Surprisingly, a guy from bulgaria managed to beat most NA players with 150 ping.

If you guys are still interested, I recommend you check out this link right here.

Read full topic

I’m just hoping Epic Games and Nordic Games create a New Painkiller Game for 360, PS3, and PC. Possibly an HD remake of Painkiller 1???

item.title: New Painkiller game?
item.dc:creator: k3nny1550
item.description:
Painkiller was pretty much Gothic styled Serious Sam. By the way, how the fuck do you beat that gigantic flaming knight boss? I unloaded everything I had on the sonuva bitch and he wouldn’t fucking DIEEEE. Are you supposed to knock him into the pit or something? If that was the case I feel dumb, but I assumed that since it was an old school shooter that all my problems could be solved with guns that solve 800 problems per minute.

Read full topic

item.title: New Painkiller game?
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
Dias:

Painkiller was not nearly as good as I had expected. I find I agree with Ben “Yahtzee” Croshaw on most videogame-related things, but I just don’t share that same nostalgia towards crummy old FPS’.

ARE YOU RETARDED CLASSIC FPS ARE BEST MODERN FPS ARE ALL THE EXACT SAME PIXEL PER PIXEL THEY JUST CHANGE THE NAME.

Read full topic
